__e: Unfortunately, it was before I had another place to live, so, ended up staying with a friend and...
Personally, I like that you're here but, isn't it better that you find your own place in life?
It's just, even if it was a great boss and a great job,
If I don't find my family, the question you should be asking yourself is, who's going to die next?
[sighs] And if only I could just find the strength to say what's in mine.
I would just like to say that I'm most thankful for my mom and dad whose faith in me taught me to have faith in myself.

It was like I was in that room with you.
